name: compose-craft
description: ComposeCraft is a web-based GUI for generating and managing Docker Compose files. It lets users visually edit services, volumes, and networks and export YAML, ideal for beginners and system administrators.
features: Visual Editor: Build Docker Compose files with drag-and-drop interface. No YAML expertise needed.
Service Management: Configure containers, volumes, and networks visually. Intuitive configuration.
YAML Export: Generate clean, production-ready compose files. Copy and deploy instantly.
Beginner Friendly: Perfect for learning Docker Compose concepts. Lower the learning curve.
Web-Based: No installation required, works in any browser. Start composing immediately.
Template Library: Pre-built configurations for common services. Deploy popular apps quickly.
